fifteenpuzzle.heuristics

Interface HeuristicInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManDist_LinearConflict, ManhattanDistance, ManhattanDistanceNaive

    public interface HeuristicInterface
    HeuristicInterface Class. This interface makes possible to use different heuristic fuctions in IDA*-algorithm.
